website_summaries.verdict: A best buy for a luxury tie rack, this one offers both easy organization and a stylish, elegant look.
pros: Most users praise the classy appearance, sturdy build, and convenient design
We also love that it is easy to mount
Has extra storage space with the upper shelf design
cons: Quality control could be improved – a few users received damaged or defective products

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I like things to be orderly and easy. Most tie racks organize ties by overlapping them on top of each other ... making it difficult to see the ties, and replace them after wear. This system fixes all of that nonsense. I have a lot of ties and want to be able to see all of them, so I can make the appropriate selection for my suit and shirt combination. I don’t have to fumble with replacing the tie in the rack at the end of the day. This tie rack is simple and looks good! Must buy for anyone with a large tie collection!
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Rack okay, wall anchors are useless.
customer_reviews.text: The tie rack itself seems okay. However, the wall anchors supplied with it do not work. They did not tighten and left the rack loose. It appears someone saved a few cents by buying cheap parts. I followed written instructions exactly. The mounting holes are 20 inches apart. Given wall studs in the USA are normally on 16 inch centers, you are virtually guaranteed to need to use at least one drywall anchor, and many folks will need two. Don't bother with the ones provided by the manufacturer. Run to your local home center and buy some that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Reliable

The routed accessory shelf conveniently holds all your important accessories and even works as a jewelry display! This is the perfect space for tie clips, cufflinks, watches, jewelry, and rings. Never waste time looking for the accessory you know you placed somewhere. Organizing all your ties, belts, necklaces, medals, and accessories in one place saves time and effort. The Erik Aleksi wall-mounting tie rack is a far superior tie organization solution over a small plastic tie hanger or messy tie drawers. Now you can see all your ties neatly sorted before your eyes to quickly find the exact tie you've been looking for!

COMFORT
With a smooth finish on both the wood and the hardware, you will not experience any unpleasant surprises or damage your ties in daily use. The solid mahogany tie shelf draws compliments, improves any room, and pleases your eye daily. Made of durable hardwood under strict quality control, this tie organizer will last to pay itself back many times over. Best of all, installing the wooden tie rack is a breeze; just two screws, included in the box with optional anchors, and you’re done! No need to assemble multiple pieces or close the door in exactly the right way.

CONFIDENCE
Surprise your father or friend on a special day with a gift that is practical and looks fantastic. Every man will feel special and confident, knowing they can choose the right tie to look exactly the way they want to!

Give the gift of convenience to yourself or a special person today - order the Erik Aleksi Tie Rack.
